text: Henry 'Boeta' Chamberlain (born ) is a South African rugby union player for the in the Currie Cup and the in the Rugby Challenge His regular position is fly-half. He made his Currie Cup debut for the Sharks in August 2019, starting their match in Round Six of the 2019 season against the and kicking a drop- goal shortly before half-time in a 30–28 victory. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:White South African people Category:South African people of British descent Category:1999 births Category:Rugby union fly-halves Category:Sharks (Currie Cup) players
title: Boeta Chamberlain
